definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Type SEVENs enjoy being the center of attention.
I'll forget about work and focus on having fun with you. Ummmm….
sentences.chinese: 我会把工作忘掉，并把焦点放在与你共度上。

sentences.english: Stationary anode, single focus, and bridge silicon rectification, The X-ray generator is an oil-immersed self-cooled unit.
sentences.chinese: 固定阳极，单焦点，桥式硅整流，油浸自冷组合式。

sentences.english: Non-interactive items that are included in the control view cannot receive keyboard focus.
sentences.chinese: 控件视图中包括的非交互式项不能接收键盘焦点。

sentences.english: This game has become the focus in- and out-side the tournament.
sentences.chinese: 这盘棋成为赛场内外关注的焦点。

sentences.english: Safety is the focus in the field of shipping.
sentences.chinese: 安全是航运界关注的焦点。

sentences.english: Studying on groundwater in Hebei Plain has been an academic focus all the time.
sentences.chinese: 河北平原地下水的研究一直以来都是学者关注的焦点。

sentences.english: The focal point of the construction lies at the W?hringerstrasse, where the main entrance, accessible through an inviting hall, is located.
sentences.chinese: 大楼结构的焦点位于由大厅可到达的主入口所在地。

sentences.english: The roles have now been reversed, with semi-clad westerners as objects of curiosity on African beaches.
sentences.chinese: 骚胸半掩的西方人在非洲海滩成为焦点。

sentences.english: Our personal view of reality hinges on what we focus ourminds on.
sentences.chinese: 我们的个人观点的确是和我们把焦点放哪有关。

sentences.english: Our primary focus is getting the feature code completed on time.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主要聚焦点是使重要的代码按时完成。

sentences.english: He focused his binoculars on the bird.
sentences.chinese: 他把双筒远镜的焦点对准在那只鸟上。

sentences.english: India obviously has preoccupations enough to keep its focus fixed on its border regions.
sentences.chinese: 印度的当务之急显然是把焦点定在边界地区。

sentences.english: Europe will be in focus at the latter part of the week.
sentences.chinese: 本周后半段，欧洲将成为市场关注的焦点。

sentences.english: Fossett focused on sailing and aviation.
sentences.chinese: 佛施特的兴趣焦点放在航海。

sentences.english: The study and use of plants for medicinal purposes is the concern of herbalism .
sentences.chinese: 植物药用的研究与应用主要是草药学关注的焦点。

definition: opera (or role) involving much singing and action/(fig.) highlight/main feature/major activity
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
to pay attention to/to follow sth closely/to follow (on social media)/concern/interest/attention
